product_name: Pearl Izumi All-Road II Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: Balancing price and performance, these Pearl Izumi All-Road II mountain bike shoes offer a stable, efficient platform for all your rides that traverse roads and beyond. Synthetic leather and nylon mesh uppers are breathable and durable; low-cut ankle support reduces overall weight. 3 rip-and-stick closure straps are angled to follow a more anatomic curve, ensuring an evenly tensioned fit and the elimination of hot spots. Nylon and composite fiber shank/plates ensure excellent power transfer. Insoles provide excellent arch support and cushion. Low-profile, concave shaping of footbed/plate cradles the foot for support, comfort and pedaling efficiency. Low-profile outsoles can be worn indoors and out. The Pearl Izumi All-Road II mountain bike shoes are compatible with 2-hole cleats; cleats are not included.
short_description: Balancing price and performance, these Pearl Izumi All-Road II mountain bike shoes offer a stable, efficient platform for all your rides that traverse roads and beyond.
